channel.title: Primitives:Couch
channel.description: Ok, so I spent like 20 minutes and made this couch [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/207lyc8.jpg[/img] I was thinking about uploading a tutorial on how to make, and mainly because this is 100% primitives. Tired of seeing all these fail traced models (like the WOW thing earlier). So, quick feedback, should I make a tutorial on primitives for couch?

item.title: Primitives:Couch
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:10, topic:333720”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=430126.msg3158279#msg3158279 date=1269230270]
Quoting sucks on itouch, so
@Dylan
1.I didn’t smooth anything, and tbh I don’t know how 2. There is a prim that is shaped like that, a square with round edges
2.I’m not good at picking textures…
3.hence why I don’t post on mitb…
4.they are wood textured, it just kinda looks like shit from that angle.
5.this or a skullcape with a crown on the back?
[/quote]
I could be mean, but I wont. This is better than a recolor and my bad about the smoothing, I completely forgot the awkward primitive that Meta has the wood shouldn’t be red… I’ll stop there.[/quote]
Ok, I’ll take that
Next time I guess I’ll post on MITB and get owned.

Read full topic

item.title: Primitives:Couch
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Wow. just… wow? I dont even know why this is here… Couches are more MITB and not RS… The texturing is horrid, the cushions are too round, the excess use of the ‘smooth’ button makes me wonder why the program hasnt crashed. The joints between the base and the arm rests make no sense. The couch legs are umm ??? i dont know what to say… Horrid. thats the word. They should be wood textured to start with.

By the way, if you feel like I’m mean, you’d probably kill yourself after hearing what some of the MITB critics would have to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Primitives:Couch
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

hmm
the legs of the couch shouldnt be red, and the cushions that you sit on need to be a little more square and thicker.

Read full topic

item.title: Primitives:Couch
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:4, topic:333720”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=430126.msg3158195#msg3158195 date=1269222546]

Its amazing how simple it is to make this.
Anyways, 7/10, simply due to simplicity but you are right, it is nice to see some primitive models for once.

I know right? So simple, yet looks great. PRIMITIVES FOREVER!
[/quote]I’ve actually forgotten how to trace. I know how, but its impossible for me to make anything good.[/quote]
First time I tried tracing, it looked like dog shit… Then I figured it’s primitives or nothing. And if you want to move on, announcement to all, it’s primitives or nothing. Goodnight

Read full topic
